name: QUENTIQ
overview:
QUENTIQ is a secure health platform which inspires you to live a healthier life. The platform calculates your personal QUENTIQ Health Score®, the indicator of your current health status in a number between 1 and 1000. By integrating gaming and networking principles, QUENTIQ motivates you to be active in a fun and easy way by tracking anc comparing your personal health, lifestyle and sport.

The QUENTIQ Health Score® is easy to understand. It’s a single number between 1 and 1000 that represents your current health status.

Your health data can be entered either manually on your QUENTIQ website profile or collected automatically by devices using wireless technology – such as:

Smartphones. Electronic scales. Blood pressure monitor. Fitness tracking devices.

The QUENTIQ Sports Tracker smartphone application records your sports activities and automatically uploads this data to your QUENTIQ website profile. Based on your personal health profile and using secure encryption, QUENTIQ then calculates your unique QUENTIQ Health Score® in real-time.

The QUENTIQ Health Score® is based on more than 72 million man years of clinical data matched to your personal health profile and sporting activities. If you go training every week and live a healthy lifestyle, your health score will go up but if you get lazy it will go down, just like your health does if you do sports or stay on the couch.

The QUENTIQ Health Score® inspires you to lead a healthier and more active lifestyle. With QUENTIQ you can track almost any sport. Both indoors and outdoors.

In each sport, Achievement points can be earned. An Achievement could be to hike a total of 100 km over three months, or simply run 5km in one go.

You can create your own Challenges and invite friends and family to participate. Challenge your friends to be the first to run 10 km or be the fastest to mountain bike a route through the forest.

Invite your friends from Facebook and other social networks.

The QUENTIQ health platform offers a 30 day free trial period and then becomes subscription based. www.quentiq.com/signup

The QUENTIQ Health Score® can also be licensed by: Corporations who want to motivate their employees to live a better and healthy life. Insurance companies offering it as a premium service to health insurance customers. Fitness centers and gyms, who want to support their clients in tracking and improving their personal health and fitness.

QUENTIQ It’s all about you®

milestones.description: QUENTIQ names Mark B Hoffman former CEO of Sybase and Commerce One, President and CEO of the newly founded QUENTIQ Americas, Inc.
milestones.source_description: QUENTIQ Names Mark B Hoffman, Former CEO of Sybase and Commerce One, President and CEO of the Newly Founded QUENTIQ Americas, Inc.
